author: Rick Michaelson
comment: Not because of the app, but because I'm constantly checking my watch for the pictures! It's just fun!
title: Causes the battery to drain.

author: Tony Wickham
comment: I love seeing all the interesting photos that represent the places I travel to right on my wrist. They often showcase the location's unique culture or idiosyncratic landmarks, and they change all the time!
title: Very contextual!

author: Elizabeth Rosenberry
comment: I think it runs my battery down faster because of the constant photo updating that goes on. Needs to be able to set a time interval perhaps.

reply.author: Twin Titanium
reply.content: It actually only retrieves photos once, unless you travel a far distance or stay in a new location for a reasonable amount of time. It also retrieves more photos once it cycles through the ones it originally retrieved; a coming update will let you lock the cycle on a particular photo to avoid this.

title: Love the concept
